name: Burg_355
culture_notes: Coastal Tongue dialect with clipped nautical terms
Diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, preserved kelp
Nightly lantern rites to calm sea-spirits
Wary of outsiders; hospitality tied to gift-offerings
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents; costly and regulated
Long-range mind-influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Near-medieval tech with pervasive localized ritual practices
Beacon atop an old brazier used in navigation augury
